title: System Design Practical Skills Enhancement: Learning Analytics-Based Personalized Mathematics Learning Intervention Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learning analytics tools can be utilized to collect and interpret progress and comprehension data for individual learners
Based on analysis results, personalized learning intervention strategies (such as providing additional materials, adjusting difficulty levels) can be designed
A model predicting learning outcomes can be applied based on data collected in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
